column5: So far I've put 1600kms on the new sled and conditions up between Deep River and Deux Riviers couldn't be better, and this week they are getting another 15cms. I know where I will be this weekend!!! This is last weekend! Booyah
not too bad matt I just got back from Cochrane a few weeks ago so far this winter I have done 3,000km over 6,0000km in 2 winters...... lots of winter left yet just have to chase the snow

That's awesome. Southern and eastern Ontario had a stupidly short season but yeah, there is still some prime conditions to be had. I hope to put 500-600 on this weekend between Saturday and Sunday. Hopefully the 15+ cms they are getting this week will expand the trails a bit. Can still do 130+ kms one way.
I'll be back on it tomorrow... although there is still a good foot here at home in the yard!
Another 6 weeks or so left up here.
Ill be out in Cochrane tomorrow for a few days. Looking to put on another 1000km

I'm happy you sleders and ATV guys finally got some snow. For the last 2 winters there wasn't enough snow here in southern Ontario to shovel, not once. Muskymatt, the last 2 pics of the trail look identical as our laneway into the property here. Identical.
